resources.name: get

resources.description: Get queue Information for an assistant.

resources.name: removeQueueFromAssistant
resources.description: Disassociate a queue from an assistant.

resources.description: Bulk add users to assistant-queue (requires manual assignment mode).

resources.name: create
resources.description: Bulk remove users from assistant-queue (requires manual assignment mode).
